channel.title: Client auto download
channel.description:
How would I make it so when you download a webclient, it automatically downloads something else? Like your first time loading the client, it loads blank.exe or blank.txt or something.
I've got an auto updater idea I've been working on, but I need it to automatically download a .exe upon loading the client. What would i edit/add?
